pageTitle: RESOURCES CONNECTION INC (RECN:NASDAQ GS): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {13996=Resources Connection Inc. announced unaudited consolidated earnings results for the fourth quarter and full year ended May 31, 2015. For the quarter, the company reported revenue of $148,814,000 against $156,783,000 a year ago. Operating income before amortization and depreciation was $15,397,000 against $14,748,000 a year ago. Operating income was $14,520,000 against $13,441,000 a year ago. Income before provision for income taxes was $14,554,000 against $13,486,000 a year ago. Net income was $8,108,000 or $0.21 per diluted share against $6,859,000 or $0.18 per diluted share a year ago. EBITDA was $15,397,000 against $14,748,000 a year ago. Adjusted EBITDA was $16,759,000 against $16,388,000 a year ago. For the full year, the company reported revenue of $590,589,000 against $567,181,000 a year ago. Operating income before amortization and depreciation was $54,565,000 against $43,291,000 a year ago. Operating income was $50,258,000 against $37,975,000 a year ago. Income before provision for income taxes was $50,406,000 against $38,143,000 a year ago. Net income was $27,508,000 or $0.72 per diluted share against $19,886,000 or $0.51 per diluted share a year ago. EBITDA was $54,565,000 against $43,291,000 a year ago. Adjusted EBITDA was $60,554,000 against $49,810,000 a year ago. Cash flow from operating activities was $31,751,000 against $32,018,000 a year ago. For fiscal 2016, the company expected capital expenditures of approximately $3 million, net of landlord reimbursements, of which about $1.2 million should occur in the first quarter. For the first quarter of fiscal 2016, the company expected tax rate of approximating 46.3%, which is adversely impacted by about 50 basis points for the stock compensation charge., 13223=On July 16, 2015, Resources Connection Inc. announced that, effective as of August 31, 2015, Donald B. Murray will retire from his position as the company's Executive Chairman and will remain Chairman of the board of directors., 4848=Resources Connection, Inc., doing business as Resources Global Professionals, provides consulting and business initiative support services in North America, Europe, and the Asia Pacific. The company offers finance and accounting services, including process transformation and improvement, financial reporting and analysis, technical and operational accounting, merger and acquisition due diligence, audit response, implementation of new accounting standards, and remediation support. It also provides information management services, such as strategy development, program and project management, business and technology integration, data strategy, and business performance management. In addition, the company offers corporate advisory, strategic communications, and restructuring services; corporate governance, risk, and compliance management services comprising contract and regulatory compliance, enterprise risk management, internal controls management, and operation and information technology (IT) audits. Further, it provides supply chain management services consisting of supply chain strategy development, procurement and supplier management, logistics and materials management, supply chain planning and forecasting, and conflict minerals and unique device identification compliance. Additionally, the company offers human capital services, including change management, organization development and effectiveness, and optimization of human resources technology and operations; and legal and regulatory services with projects, secondments, or tactical needs, such as commercial transactions, compliance initiatives, law department operations, and business strategy and litigation support. It also provides policyIQ, a proprietary cloud-based governance, risk, and compliance software application. Resources Connection, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Irvine, California., 16092=Resources Connection Inc. announced that they will report Q4, 2015 results After-Market on Jul 16, 2015}
